mapper.select: select substr((select n_xy from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_start),0,9) as startx, substr((select n_xy from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_start),12,10) as starty, (select n_name from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_start) as startname, substr((select n_xy from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_via),0,9) as viax, substr((select n_xy from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_via),12,10) as viay, (select n_name from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_via) as vianame, substr((select n_xy from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_end),0,9) as endx, substr((select n_xy from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_end),12,10) as endy, (select n_name from node where node.n_num = waybill.n_end) as endname from waybill where w_num = #{w_num}
